webwork-tex.statement:
\par For the given position vectors \(\mathbf{r}(t)\) compute the unit tangent vector \(\mathbf{T}(t)\) for the given value of \(t\) . \par
A) \(\textrm{Let }\mathbf{r}(t)= (\cos 5t,\sin 5t )\). \leavevmode\\\relax Then \(\mathbf{T}(\frac{\pi}{4})\)= ( \mbox{\parbox[t]{7.5ex}{\hrulefill}} , \mbox{\parbox[t]{7.5ex}{\hrulefill}} ) \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax
B) \(\textrm{Let } \mathbf{r}(t)= (t^2,t^3)\). \leavevmode\\\relax Then \(\mathbf{T}(5)\)= ( \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} , \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} ) \leavevmode\\\relax
C) \(\textrm{Let } \mathbf{r}(t)= e^{5t}\mathbf{i}+ e^{-5t}\mathbf{j}+ t\mathbf{k}\). \leavevmode\\\relax Then \(\mathbf{T}(5)\)= \mbox{\parbox[t]{6.5ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\mathbf{i}+\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{6.5ex}{\hrulefill}}\(\mathbf{j}+\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{6.5ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\mathbf{k}\) . \leavevmode\\\relax
